questions.title: Median of Two Sorted Arrays
questions.prompt: Given two sorted arrays nums1 and nums2 of size m and n, return the median of the two sorted arrays in O(log(min(m,n))) time.
followups: Why is binary search applicable here?
What edge cases make this problem tricky?
How does your solution guarantee logarithmic time?

questions.title: Word Ladder
questions.prompt: Given two words and a dictionary, find the length of the shortest transformation sequence from beginWord to endWord.
followups: Why is BFS preferred over DFS?
How do you optimize adjacency generation?
What is the time and space complexity?

questions.title: Course Schedule II
questions.prompt: Given prerequisites for courses, return a valid order to finish all courses or an empty array if impossible.
followups: How do you detect cycles?
What is the difference between DFS and BFS solutions?
How does this scale with large inputs?

questions.title: Serialize and Deserialize Binary Tree
questions.prompt: Design an algorithm to serialize and deserialize a binary tree.
followups: How do you handle null nodes?
What format would you choose and why?
What are the space implications?

questions.title: Longest Increasing Path in a Matrix
questions.prompt: Find the length of the longest increasing path in a matrix.
followups: Why is memoization needed?
What is the time complexity?
How do you avoid recomputation?

questions.title: Design Google Drive Sync (High-Level)
questions.prompt: Design a simplified file synchronization system like Google Drive.
followups: How do you handle conflicts?
How do you optimize for offline usage?
What consistency guarantees would you provide?

questions.title: Find All Critical Connections
questions.prompt: Given a network, find all critical connections whose removal disconnects the graph.
followups: What are low-link values?
Why does DFS work here?
What real-world systems resemble this?

questions.title: Sliding Window Maximum
questions.prompt: Given an array and window size k, return the maximum for each sliding window.
followups: Why does a deque work here?
What is the time complexity?
How does this compare to heap-based solutions?

questions.title: Edit Distance
questions.prompt: Given two strings, compute the minimum number of operations required to convert one into the other.
followups: What is the DP state definition?
How do you optimize space?
What real-world applications use this?

questions.title: Design a Rate Limiter (Distributed)
questions.prompt: Design a distributed rate limiter for a global service.
followups: How do you handle clock skew?
What trade-offs exist between accuracy and performance?
How does this scale globally?

questions.title: Trapping Rain Water
questions.prompt: Given an elevation map, compute how much water it can trap.
followups: Why does the two-pointer approach work?
What is the space complexity?
How would you explain this visually?

questions.title: Design Search Autocomplete
questions.prompt: Design an autocomplete system that returns the top-k frequent search queries.
followups: How do you rank results?
How do you update frequencies efficiently?
What are memory constraints?

questions.title: Maximum Profit with K Transactions
questions.prompt: Given stock prices and k transactions, compute maximum profit.
followups: What changes when k is large?
How do you reduce space complexity?
Why is greedy insufficient?

questions.title: Design a Web Crawler
questions.prompt: Design a scalable web crawler that respects politeness and avoids duplicates.
followups: How do you avoid crawling the same URL twice?
How do you scale crawling?
How do you handle failures?

questions.title: Alien Dictionary
questions.prompt: Given a sorted list of words from an alien language, derive the order of characters.
followups: What makes this problem tricky?
How do you detect invalid input?
What is the complexity?

questions.title: Design YouTube Recommendation (High-Level)
questions.prompt: Explain how you would design a recommendation system for YouTube.
followups: What signals would you use?
How do you avoid filter bubbles?
How do you measure success?

questions.title: Burst Balloons
questions.prompt: Given balloons with values, compute maximum coins by bursting them optimally.
followups: What is the subproblem definition?
Why does greedy fail?
What is the complexity?

questions.title: Design a Global Counter
questions.prompt: Design a counter system that handles billions of increments per day.
followups: How do you ensure accuracy?
How do you reduce contention?

questions.title: Minimum Window Substring
questions.prompt: Find the smallest substring of s that contains all characters of t.
followups: What invariant does the window maintain?
